StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetTLogBySSN]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SSN char(9), @Transac.onDate date.me = NULL AS
SELECT T.* FROM TRANS_LOG T INNER JOIN NWA N ON T.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID WHERE P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN AND ( (@Transac.onDate IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(DAY, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, @Transac.onDate) = 0) OR (@Transac.onDate IS NULL AND DATEDIFF(DAY, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, GETDATE()) >= 0) ) ORDER BY T.TRANSACTION_DATE DESC
